name: Cat Claws - A Rhythm Heaven-Inspired Minigame!
name_original: Cat Claws - A Rhythm Heaven-Inspired Minigame!
description:
You play as a brave mouse warrior, whose sole purpose in life is to put himself in danger... to the beat!

This was made for my solo game development class and was quite the challenge!

Use the arrow keys to dodge left or right. Try to stay on beat!
